title: Aatrox blood well up and died without it being used.
body:
I played a game not too long ago in patch 4.20 where I was playing as aatrox at top lane, I had not even lost blood well for a good 5 minutes while i was being ganked constantly, and then I got smited by the enemy jungler and it instantly killed me without using up my blood well, I had blood well up after I spawned.

Also I have played approximately 1000 games with ashe total and her w still frequently passes over something it should be hitting.

She is without a doubt my favourite champion so if you could please fix her up that would be highly appreciated.
